compliant.section: This privacy policy explains (a) our governing principles for privacy practices; (b) how we collect, use, and otherwise process your personal information; and (c) your rights regarding our processing of your personal information in good faith.
compliant.legal provisions: This section aligns with the GDPR's requirements for providing a concise, transparent, intelligible, and easily accessible privacy notice.

compliant.section: At Aten International Co., Ltd. (and its affiliates, collectively “Aten”, “Company”, “we”, “us” or “our”), in the conduct of our business, we receive personal information relating to the individuals with whom the Company interacts, including with respect to employees and contracted or agency workers, candidates for and applicants to positions as employees, individuals (and our customer representatives) who are customers, and potential customers, individuals (and our reseller representatives) who are vendors and suppliers and potential vendors and suppliers, visitors to our websites (including aten.com and iogear.com; which may be referred to collectively as the “Websites”), individual shareholders and directors who may or may not be employees of the Company, and any other individuals from whom the Company receives personal information (each referred to as “you” or “your”).
compliant.legal provisions: This section defines personal data, aligning with the GDPR's definition.

non_compliant.section: We adopt this Privacy Policy out of respect for your personal information.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this statement expresses good intentions, the GDPR requires a lawful basis for processing personal data, not just respect.
non_compliant.amend: This statement should be amended to explicitly state the legal basis for processing personal data, such as consent, contractual necessity, legal obligation, vital interests, public interest, or legitimate interests.

non_compliant.section: Our personnel are required to comply with the Company’s data privacy practices and other Company policies related to data privacy established in this Privacy Policy.
non_compliant.legal provisions: While this statement highlights internal accountability, the GDPR mandates specific organizational and technical measures to ensure data security.
non_compliant.amend: The policy should detail the specific technical and organizational measures implemented to protect personal data, such as data encryption, access controls, and employee training.
